data.text:
GREATFUL TO STAY,,

Acandia Hotel. My very first time to exoerienced like this.. the hotel is very nice.. outside and inside well design and decorated 
 Very clean and well maintained. Its perfect.. so beautuful. And views around the location. Very spacious room and luxury nice wall design. Its an accomodating to stay! Peaceful & quiet..outdoor Pool too. Clean and large.. with a greatful amenities...Excellet breakfast . & buffet with a selection bar you are choosen. Superb delicious food for serving!! ACANDIA HOTEL AT Rhodes exactly ! Perfect to stay..I highly reccommend.. and the staff was helpful always smile at thier guests 

Value ● 5 |  Location ● 5  Service ● 5
data.title: Acandia Hotel

user_location.name: Francisco I. Madero Municipality, Central Mexico and Gulf Coast

data.text:
Great location, close to everything. 
Close to the beach, Casino, restaurants and old town! 
friendly stuff , always with a smile.
New brand hotel, only few years open 
So many choices for breakfast, 
Value for money. 
Will come back for sure!!!
data.title: GREAT CHOICE !!!!!!

data.text:
We have visit Rhodes for years now. This time it was the best holiday what we ever had. Thanks to this hotel! We have changed our hotels many times throug the years, because nothing really feel right for us. Until last year we made best decision of our life and book Acandia for our couple week holiday.

The hotel have very nice lobby, but that first impression continues into to the rooms as well. Rooms are fresh and the use of wood brings them coziness. Pillows are comfortable and bed is good quality, so you can rest easy. Air conditioning is the best we have come across in Rhodes. Cleaning was always top notch!

Breakfast was SUPERB! Lots of choice and never runs out. 

Staff was really nice. I loved that they were not overly top friendly, which is not our cup of tea. But they were very helpful if you needed help. 

There are so much good things say to this hotel, but easy to say - We will definitely come back. Thanks to make our beloved Rhodes even better for us!
data.title: You will not be disappointed if you book this hotel!

data.text: Hello , I had 3 weeks from 25.August. My second stay at this hotel. All is nice here at Acandia; Reception staff both day and night, Mike in the bar, Sabrina and other staff at breakfast and in the pool bar, cleaning 100% perfect. I will for sure come back to Acandia next time i visit Rhodes. I had room 510 facing the street, morning sun, and nice evenings to just sit on balcony. No problem with traffic noise when balcony door closed.
data.title: Best hotel i have stayed in when visit Rhodes

user_location.name: Alta, Alta Municipality, Finnmark, Northern Norway

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

We are truly honored by your glowing review. It's a delight to hear that your three-week stay with us at Acandia was a remarkable experience. From the attentive reception staff to Mike at the bar, Sabrina, and the breakfast and pool bar team, we're thrilled that they contributed to your enjoyment. The immaculate cleanliness and the comfort of your room facing the street added to the pleasure of your stay.

Your kind words mean the world to us, and we're eagerly looking forward to hosting you once again on your next visit to Rhodes. Thank you for choosing Acandia—we can't wait to welcome you back!

Warm regards,
Acandia Hotel team
owner_response.author: Digital Marketing Agency

data.text: Very impressed with the place and the staff - everyone very friendly and helpful, in particular Mike the barman (thanks for the restaurant recommendations). Very central location and standard room was a good size.
data.title: Super!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We're thrilled to hear that you were impressed with our establishment and the exceptional service provided by our team. It's fantastic to know that everyone, especially Mike, our barman, was very friendly and offered helpful recommendations, making your stay more enjoyable. Our central location and the spacious standard room further added to your positive experience.

We sincerely appreciate your feedback and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another wonderful stay in the future.

Warm regards,
Acandia Hotel team
owner_response.author: Digital Marketing Agency
